cnd17:2.3_15: lokuttarenapi jhānena jhāyī jhānarato ekattamanuyutto sadatthagarukoti—
cnd17:2.6_0: Te rajā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
cnd17:2.7_0: Tasmā buddho arajo virajo nirajo rajāpagato rajavippahīno rajavippayutto sabbarajavītivatto.
cnd17:3.1_0: Rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati,
cnd17:4.1_0: Doso rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati,
cnd17:5.1_0: Moho rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati,
cnd17:8.2_0: Atha vā bhagavā sabbossukkapaṭippassaddhattā āsīno vutthavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo …pe…
cnd17:10.1_0: Katakiccaṁ anāsavanti buddhassa bhagavato kiccākiccaṁ karaṇīyākaraṇīyaṁ pahīnaṁ ucchinnamūlaṁ
cnd17:12.4_0: Te āsavā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
cnd17:13.1_0: Pāraguṁ sabbadhammānanti bhagavā sabbadhammānaṁ abhiññāpāragū pariññāpāragū pahānapāragū bhāvanāpāragū sacchikiriyāpāragū samāpattipāragū.
cnd17:13.7_0: So pāragato pārappatto antagato antappatto koṭigato koṭippatto pariyantagato pariyantappatto vosānagato
cnd17:13.7_1: vosānappatto tāṇagato tāṇappatto leṇagato leṇappatto saraṇagato saraṇappatto abhayagato abhayappatto
cnd17:13.7_2: accutagato accutappatto amatagato amatappatto nibbānagato nibbānappatto.
cnd17:13.8_0: So vuttavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo …pe… jātimaraṇasaṁsāro natthi tassa punabbhavoti—
cnd17:14.2_0: Atha vā pañhatthikānaṁ pañhaṁ pucchitukāmānaṁ pañhaṁ sotukāmānaṁ āgamanaṁ abhikkamanaṁ upasaṅkamanaṁ payirupāsanaṁ atthīti,
cnd17:14.3_1: tvampi pahu tvamasi alamatto mayā pucchitaṁ kathetuṁ visajjetuṁ,
cnd17:15.2_0: Arahattavimokkhaṁ pabrūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti—
cnd17:16.1_0: Avijjāya pabhedananti avijjāya bhedanaṁ pabhedanaṁ pahānaṁ vūpasamaṁ paṭinissaggaṁ paṭippassaddhaṁ amataṁ nibbānanti—
cnd17:19.2_0: Chandoti yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmataṇhā kāmasineho kāmapipāsā kāmapariḷāho
cnd17:19.2_1: kāmamucchā kāmajjhosānaṁ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmupādānaṁ kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṁ.
cnd17:19.3_0: Pahānaṁ kāmacchandānanti kāmacchandānaṁ pahānaṁ vūpasamaṁ paṭinissaggaṁ paṭippassaddhiṁ amataṁ nibbānanti—
cnd17:20.2_0: Domanassāti yaṁ cetasikaṁ asātaṁ cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ asātaṁ dukkhaṁ vedayitaṁ,
cnd17:20.3_0: Domanassāna cūbhayanti kāmacchandassa ca domanassassa ca ubhinnaṁ pahānaṁ vūpasamaṁ paṭinissaggaṁ paṭippassaddhiṁ amataṁ nibbānanti—
cnd17:21.2_0: Thinanti yā cittassa akalyatā akammaññatā olīyanā sallīyanā līnā līyanā līyitattaṁ thinaṁ thiyanā thiyitattaṁ cittassa.
cnd17:21.3_0: Panūdananti thinassa ca panūdanaṁ pahānaṁ vūpasamaṁ paṭinissaggaṁ paṭippassaddhiṁ amataṁ nibbānanti—
cnd17:22.5_0: Yaṁ evarūpaṁ kukkuccaṁ kukkuccāyanā kukkuccāyitattaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho,
cnd17:22.6_0: Api ca dvīhi kāraṇehi uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho—
cnd17:22.8_0: Kathaṁ katattā ca akatattā ca uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho?
cnd17:22.9_1: akataṁ me kāyasucaritan”ti uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho.
cnd17:22.12_0: “kato me pāṇātipāto, akatā me pāṇātipātā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.13_0: “kataṁ me adinnādānaṁ, akatā me adinnādānā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.14_0: “kato me kāmesumicchācāro, akatā me kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.15_0: “kato me musāvādo, akatā me musāvādā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.16_0: “katā me pisuṇā vācā, akatā me pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.17_0: “katā me pharusā vācā, akatā me pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.18_0: “kato me samphappalāpo, akatā me samphappalāpā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.21_0: “katā me micchādiṭṭhi, akatā me sammādiṭṭhī”ti, uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho.
cnd17:22.22_0: Evaṁ katattā ca akatattā ca uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho.
cnd17:23.1_0: Atha vā “sīlesumhi aparipūrakārī”ti uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho;
cnd17:23.7_3: nirodho me asacchikato”ti uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho.
cnd17:24.1_0: Kukkuccānaṁ nivāraṇanti kukkuccānaṁ āvaraṇaṁ nīvaraṇaṁ pahānaṁ upasamaṁ vūpasamaṁ paṭinissaggaṁ paṭippassaddhiṁ amataṁ nibbānanti—
cnd17:27.2_0: Upekkhāti yā catutthe jhāne upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā cittasamatā cittappassaddhatā majjhattatā cittassa.
cnd17:27.3_0: Satīti yā catutthe jhāne upekkhaṁ ārabbha sati anussati …pe… sammāsati.
cnd17:27.4_0: Upekkhāsatisaṁsuddhanti catutthe jhāne upekkhā ca sati ca suddhā honti visuddhā saṁsuddhā parisuddhā
cnd17:27.4_1: pariyodātā anaṅgaṇā vigatūpakkilesā mudubhūtā kammaniyā ṭhitā āneñjappattāti—
cnd17:28.2_0: So ādito hoti, purato hoti, pubbaṅgamo hoti aññāvimokkhassāti, evampi dhammatakkapurejavaṁ.
cnd17:28.4_0: Sā ādito hoti, purato hoti, pubbaṅgamo hoti aññāvimokkhassāti, evampi dhammatakkapurejavaṁ.
cnd17:28.5_0: Atha vā dhammatakko vuccati catunnaṁ maggānaṁ pubbabhāgavipassanā.
cnd17:28.6_0: Sā ādito hoti, purato hoti, pubbaṅgamo hoti aññāvimokkhassāti—
cnd17:29.2_0: Arahattavimokkhaṁ pabrūmi ācikkhāmi desemi paññapemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi pakāsemīti—
cnd17:30.3_0: Pabhedananti avijjāya pabhedanaṁ pahānaṁ vūpasamaṁ paṭinissaggaṁ paṭippassaddhiṁ amataṁ nibbānanti—
cnd17:33.1_0: Kiṁsu saṁyojano lokoti lokassa saṁyojanaṁ lagganaṁ bandhanaṁ upakkileso.
cnd17:33.2_0: Kena loko yutto payutto āyutto samāyutto laggo laggito palibuddhoti—
cnd17:34.1_0: Kiṁsu tassa vicāraṇanti kiṁsu tassa cāraṇaṁ vicāraṇaṁ paṭivicāraṇaṁ.
cnd17:34.4_0: Kissassa vippahānena nibbānaṁ iti vuccatīti kissassa vippahānena vūpasamena paṭinissaggena paṭippassaddhiyā
cnd17:34.4_1: nibbānaṁ iti vuccati pavuccati kathīyati bhaṇīyati dīpīyati voharīyatīti—
cnd17:37.2_0: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṁ, ayaṁ vuccati nandī.
cnd17:37.3_0: Yā nandī lokassa saṁyojanaṁ lagganaṁ bandhanaṁ upakkileso,
cnd17:37.3_1: imāya nandiyā loko yutto payutto āyutto samāyutto laggo laggito palibuddhoti—
cnd17:38.5_0: Ime nava vitakkā lokassa cāraṇā vicāraṇā paṭivicāraṇā.
cnd17:38.6_0: Imehi navahi vitakkehi loko carati vicarati paṭivicaratīti—
cnd17:39.3_0: Taṇhāya vippahānena nibbānaṁ iti vuccatīti taṇhāya vippahānena vūpasamena paṭinissaggena paṭippassaddhiyā
cnd17:39.3_1: nibbānaṁ iti vuccati pavuccati kathīyati bhaṇīyati dīpīyati voharīyatīti—
cnd17:42.1_0: Kathaṁ satassa caratoti kathaṁ satassa sampajānassa carato viharato iriyato vattayato pālayato yapayato yāpayatoti—
cnd17:43.1_0: Viññāṇaṁ uparujjhatīti viññāṇaṁ nirujjhati vūpasammati atthaṁ gacchati paṭippassambhatīti—
cnd17:44.1_0: Bhagavantaṁ puṭṭhumāgamāti buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ puṭṭhuṁ pucchituṁ yācituṁ ajjhesituṁ pasādetuṁ āgamhā āgatamhā upāgatamhā sampattamhā,
cnd17:45.2_0: Tanti tuyhaṁ vacanaṁ byappathaṁ desanaṁ anusāsanaṁ anusiṭṭhaṁ suṇoma uggaṇhāma dhārema upadhārema upalakkhemāti—
cnd17:48.1_0: Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca vedanaṁ nābhinandatoti ajjhattaṁ vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti,
cnd17:48.1_1: abhinandanaṁ abhivadanaṁ ajjhosānaṁ gāhaṁ parāmāsaṁ abhinivesaṁ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti;
cnd17:48.2_0: bahiddhā vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti,
cnd17:48.2_1: abhinandanaṁ abhivadanaṁ ajjhosānaṁ gāhaṁ parāmāsaṁ abhinivesaṁ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti;
cnd17:48.3_0: ajjhattabahiddhā vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti,
cnd17:48.3_1: abhinandanaṁ abhivadanaṁ ajjhosānaṁ gāhaṁ parāmāsaṁ abhinivesaṁ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti.
cnd17:49.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ samudayadhammānupassī vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti,
cnd17:49.1_1: abhinandanaṁ abhivadanaṁ ajjhosānaṁ gāhaṁ parāmāsaṁ abhinivesaṁ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti;
cnd17:49.4_0: bahiddhā samudayadhammānupassī vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti,
cnd17:49.4_1: abhinandanaṁ abhivadanaṁ ajjhosānaṁ gāhaṁ parāmāsaṁ abhinivesaṁ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti;
cnd17:49.9_0: ajjhattabahiddhā samudayavayadhammānupassī vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti,
cnd17:49.9_1: abhinandanaṁ abhivadanaṁ ajjhosānaṁ gāhaṁ parāmāsaṁ abhinivesaṁ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti.
cnd17:49.10_0: Imehi dvādasahi ākārehi vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto …pe…
cnd17:50.1_0: Atha vā vedanaṁ aniccato passanto vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti,
cnd17:50.1_1: abhinandanaṁ abhivadanaṁ ajjhosānaṁ gāhaṁ parāmāsaṁ abhinivesaṁ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti.
cnd17:50.2_0: Vedanaṁ dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato …pe…
cnd17:50.3_0: nissaraṇato passanto vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti,
cnd17:50.3_1: abhinandanaṁ abhivadanaṁ ajjhosānaṁ gāhaṁ parāmāsaṁ abhinivesaṁ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti.
cnd17:50.4_0: Imehi cattālīsāya ākārehi vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti,
cnd17:50.4_1: abhinandanaṁ abhivadanaṁ ajjhosānaṁ gāhaṁ parāmāsaṁ abhinivesaṁ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gametīti—
cnd17:51.1_0: Evaṁ satassa caratoti evaṁ satassa sampajānassa carato viharato iriyato vattayato pālayato yapayato yāpayatoti—
cnd17:52.1_1: āneñjābhisaṅkhārasahagataṁ viññāṇaṁ nirujjhati vūpasammati atthaṁ gacchati paṭippassambhatīti—
